div1.p: Keen requests information on all those who volunteered for the yellow fever experiments.

div1.head: Letter from W.W. Keen to Howard A. Kelly, December 12, 1908
div1.p:
Thank you very much for the copy of the tablet and
the statement about the men. I would like a little further infor-
mation. Not only Lazear, but Carroll volunteered and was inoculated,
and there were some other doctors and several men who also volun-
teered. Some of the latter were paid. I want to get the data
as to the entire number of doctors and others who volunteered, how
many of them were paid and how many lost their lives. I shall be
very much obliged to you if you can give me this information.
